LightningComponentBundle.description: A horizontal card with image on left, heading and description on right. Based on official Ontario Design System horizontal card component.

property.name: heading
property.label: Heading
property.description: The title of the feature card

property.name: url
property.label: URL
property.description: URL to navigate to when the card is clicked

property.name: image
property.label: Image URL
property.description: Image URL to display on the left side of the card

property.name: imageAltText
property.label: Image Alt Text
property.description: Alternative text for the image (for accessibility)

property.name: imageSize
property.label: Image Size
property.description: Size of the image: large (1/3 of card width) or small (1/4 of card width)

property.name: className
property.label: Additional CSS Class
property.description: Additional CSS class to apply to the card
